name: Metallic Yield
description:
‏‎

Citizen, your name has been drawn via Lakon-Dye Selection Responsibilities of the Selected-Harvester

As the selected-harvester it is your duty to dive down into the irradiated wastes and harvest parts from the skeletal remains of long forgotten skyscrapers.

The work is dangerous, the dust-clouds near the surface are extremely radioactive, and most don’t return.

Council has deemed fit to provide you with the latest in sky-harvesting technologies:

  • The Matter-Stream Transmitter[Left Click], to allow for remoting harvesting. Instantly transmits requisite elements back to the Valkyrie.
  • The G4PL-Tether Device[Right Click], usable for rapid vertical recovery & unsanctioned grappling maneuvers.

May Mercer guide you, Godspeed.

Tools & Inspiration

I took heavy inspiration for this game from Deep Rock Galactic & GOOM (a previous game of mine)

  • Unity
  • Random, real-life construction debris
  • Paint.net
  • Audacity
  • (Font) IronManOfWar
Headphones Strongly Recommended
